description:
Kiyo is immersing himself in his father’s archaeology texts and is closing in on the location of Milordo-Z’s whereabouts. Megumi and Tia also help, but Megumi is feeling the pressure of her busy life as a high school student and pop star. When Ponygon goe
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 打倒ロード! それぞれの決意
